languages.text: "Достойный ответ. Права, даруемые Патентом, это не столько привилегия, сколько бремя. Использовать их во благо Империума и не пятнать чистоту веры — задача, непосильная обычному человеку".

"Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."
languages.original_text: "Достойный ответ. Права, даруемые Патентом, это не столько привилегия, сколько бремя. Использовать их во благо Империума и не пятнать чистоту веры — задача, непосильная обычному человеку".

traits.locale_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

"Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

"Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

languages.text: “确实如此，神圣授状赋予的权力与其说是特权，不如说是负担。授状的持有者需要为了帝国的利益而行使权力，同时又不能玷污信仰的纯洁性。无论对谁而言，这都是非常艰巨的任务。”
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，神圣授状赋予的权力与其说是特权，不如说是负担。授状的持有者需要为了帝国的利益而行使权力，同时又不能玷污信仰的纯洁性。无论对谁而言，这都是非常艰巨的任务。”

languages.text: «Bien dicho. Los derechos otorgados por la Patente son más una carga que un privilegio. Ejercerlos por el bien del Imperium sin mancillar la pureza de la fe es una tarea demasiado exigente para un individuo corriente».
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: «Bien dicho. Los derechos otorgados por la Patente son más una carga que un privilegio. Ejercerlos por el bien del Imperium sin mancillar la pureza de la fe es una tarea demasiado exigente para un individuo corriente».

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Les droits octroyés par la lettre de marque relèvent davantage du fardeau que du privilège. Exercer ces droits au nom du bien de l'Imperium sans entacher la pureté de sa foi est un devoir bien trop complexe pour un individu ordinaire. »
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Les droits octroyés par la lettre de marque relèvent davantage du fardeau que du privilège. Exercer ces droits au nom du bien de l'Imperium sans entacher la pureté de sa foi est un devoir bien trop complexe pour un individu ordinaire. »

languages.text: 「その通りです。令状によって与えられた権利は特権というよりもむしろ重荷です。自らの信仰の純粋さを汚さずに、帝国のためにそれを行使するのは、凡人にはあまりにも重すぎる使命ですから」
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。令状によって与えられた権利は特権というよりもむしろ重荷です。自らの信仰の純粋さを汚さずに、帝国のためにそれを行使するのは、凡人にはあまりにも重すぎる使命ですから」

languages.text: "Aynen öyle. Ruhsatname'nin tanıdığı haklar, ayrıcalıktan çok birer yüktür. Bunları inancını saflığını lekelemeden İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için kullanmak, sıradan bir insan için çok büyük bir görevdir."
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Ruhsatname'nin tanıdığı haklar, ayrıcalıktan çok bir yüktür. Bunları kişinin inancının saflığını lekelemeden, İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için kullanmak, sıradan bir birey için çok büyük bir görevdir."

languages.text: "Schön gesagt. Die Rechte durch den Handelsbrief sind mehr eine Bürde als ein Privileg. Sie zum Wohle des Imperiums einzusetzen, ohne die Reinheit des eigenen Glaubens zu beflecken, ist eine zu große Aufgabe für gewöhnliche Individuen."
languages.original_text: "Well put. The rights granted by the Warrant are a burden more than they are a privilege. Exercising them for the good of the Imperium without staining the purity of one's faith is a task too great for any ordinary individual."

traits.locale_text: "Schön gesagt. Die Rechte durch den Handelsbrief sind mehr eine Bürde als ein Privileg. Sie zum Wohle des Imperiums einzusetzen, ohne die Reinheit des eigenen Glaubens zu beflecken, ist eine zu große Aufgabe für gewöhnliche Individuen."
